question_text: What distinguishes a basic cable tester from an advanced multifunction tester?
answer_options: Basic testers require PoE to function
Multifunction testers can measure signal timing, wiremap, and crosstalk
Basic testers only test fiber optic cables
Multifunction testers only work with coaxial cable
correct_answer: Multifunction testers can measure signal timing, wiremap, and crosstalk
explanation: Advanced cable testers include diagnostics for signal quality, timing, and interferenceâ€”not just continuity.
